name: Space Race (Gloubii)
description:
Space Race is a 3D runner (kinda) where you must lead your ship to the portal at the end of the level.

You must either dodge the asteroïds or smash them to lose parts of your ship and fit easier in the portal.

This game can be played by up to 4 players which will control different reactors of the same ship. If a reactor is lost, the player can't control the ship anymore.

Made with Unity in 2017 by Adama Diallo as a 3D artist, Emile Boisaubert and Aymeric Bacqua as music composers and Wyzuj Maxime as game designer, 3D artist and programmer.
